title: Forum Lesson #1337.2
body:
When you say your going to quit a forum, just do it quietly because no one will really care and telling people just shows your desperate for attention.

However they will care if you back out on it because it'll make you look like a utter fool and your actions a joke

Ever more so if you don't even hold out for less than an hour...

This forum usage lesson has been brought to you by 2nd Chance

_"Everyone gets a 2nd Chance, but only one 2nd Chance."_

Now shitepost on forums wisely and high-quality now! :3

yep yep

http://pokemon-online.eu/data/avatars/l/51/51041.jpg?1396589978
